articles.author: Aaron Gregg, Dan Diamond
articles.title: American Airlines flights resume after brief halt over computer issue - The Washington Post
articles.description: The company said the ground stop was caused by a technology issue with one of its vendors which impacted a key system.
articles.content:
American Airlines grounded all of its U.S. flights for about an hourTuesday morning after a glitch with its flight operations system, leading to widespread flight delays.
The flight-tracking website… [+306 chars]

articles.author: Sharmila Kuthunur
articles.title: NASA's Parker Solar Probe completes historic Christmas Eve flyby of the sun — but it could take days to know if it survived - Livescience.com
articles.description: On Christmas Eve, NASA's Parker Solar Probe flew closer to the sun than any human-made object ever — a stunning technological feat that scientists liken to the historic Apollo moon landing in 1969.
articles.content:
NASA's Parker Solar Probe
 is spending Christmas Eve on a history-making attempt to fly closer to the sun

articles.title: Apple Reportedly Planning To Release Its M4 MacBook Air Lineup Before It Officially Announces The Low-Cost iPad And iPhone SE 4 - Wccftech
articles.description: Customers looking forward to the 13-inch and 15-inch M4 MacBook Air models should be glad because the new lineup is arriving quicker
articles.content: The launch of the new 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models, along with the M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max could have hinted that Apple could take a small break before unveiling the MacBook Air family. Howev… [+2359 chars]
